1.0.1.name: wordpress/catalyst-connect
1.0.1.description:
Whether you want to add Social Networking functionality, a full blown Forum, or a comprehensive E-Commerce solution to your Catalyst powered website you will need to apply some specific code tweaks to make it happen. So instead of requiring such customization of Catalyst by the end-user we've developed the Catalyst Connect Plugin to do all the coding work for you.

Just activate this Plugin and then start enjoying easy integration of BuddyPress, BBPress and WooCommerce with the Catalyst Framework.
